description: This cocktail will make you get up from your hangover. Revive the wildest party of your life with this Limoncello Reviver, a unique twist on a&nbsp;Corpse Reviver cocktail that features citrusy limoncello, deep purple&nbsp;gin, and a secret ingredient for a refreshing sip.
name: Limoncello Reviver

recipeInstructions.name: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker halfway full of ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker halfway full of ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake until the liquid is cooled, then strain into a large coupe glass over the pink coconut water ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake until the liquid is cooled, then strain into a large coupe glass over the pink coconut water ice.

recipeInstructions.name: If preferred, garnish with an orange peel and a purple edible flower.

recipeInstructions.name: Freeze the coconut water in a big spherical mold, such as the Tovolo Ice Sphere Mold, or standard ice cubes. The Tovolo mold takes about 6 hours to freeze.
